text: Salisbury is a city in southeastern Maryland, USA. It is the county seat of Wicomico County and the largest city in the state's Eastern Shore region. The population was 33,050 at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Salisbury official website * Salisbury Area Chamber of Commerce * Salisbury Jaycees * Sister Cities Association of Salisbury / Wicomico County Category:Cities in Maryland Category:County seats in Maryland Category:1730s establishments in the Thirteen Colonies Category:18th-century establishments in Maryland
title: Salisbury, Maryland
